verbs.description: In the past few days , the furor [V: has] intensified over the Trump administration ’s practice of separating children from their parents when apprehended at the US - Mexico border . Here are four things you need to know about the controversy : Who is responsible for the family separations ? President Donald Trump and his administration are . They have falsely argued that they are merely enforcing the law . But there is no law that requires families ...
